title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 November 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (19/11/2008 01:27): XWiki.KevinGelinas was modified by XWiki.KevinGelinas (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/KevinGelinas  
xwikibot - (19/11/2008 06:12): XWiki.tcs was modified by XWiki.tcs (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/tcs  
xwikibot - (19/11/2008 13:19): XWiki.XWikiAllGroup was modified by xwiki:XWiki.RaffaelloPelagalli - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiAllGroup  
xwikibot - (19/11/2008 13:19): XWiki.tcs was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol (deleted document) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/tcs  
xwikibot - (19/11/2008 16:08): XWiki.DimitriDogadin was modified by XWiki.DimitriDogadin (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/DimitriDogadin  
xwikibot - (19/11/2008 16:09): XWiki.DimitriDogadin was modified by XWiki.DimitriDogadin - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/DimitriDogadin  
xwikibot - (19/11/2008 16:09): XWiki.DimitriDogadin was modified by XWiki.DimitriDogadin - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/DimitriDogadin  
xwikibot - (19/11/2008 16:10): XWiki.DimitriDogadin was modified by XWiki.DimitriDogadin - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/DimitriDogadin  
xwikibot - (19/11/2008 16:17): XWiki.igamero was modified by XWiki.igamero (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/igamero  
vmassol - (19/11/2008 21:16): lucaa: I think you forgot the specify component and versions in http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-2827  
vmassol - (19/11/2008 21:16): you should also put a fix for date for http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-2781  
vmassol - (19/11/2008 21:16): (and to all issues you're working on in general)  
lucaa - (19/11/2008 21:17): vmassol: yes, I think I did, I think I used the evil quick subtask creation form  
vmassol - (19/11/2008 21:18): ah possibly, I don't like subtasks (never used them)  
vmassol - (19/11/2008 21:18): s/used/use/  
vmassol - (19/11/2008 21:18): I prefer to link tasks  
vmassol - (19/11/2008 21:18): it's easier to close them across releases  
lucaa - (19/11/2008 21:18): yes, you are right  
vmassol - (19/11/2008 21:18): (otherwise you're stuck with the master task)  
lucaa - (19/11/2008 21:19): but the issue was already there and I split it in 2 issues, 2 patches, that's why I subtasked
